de.hft.gradingassistant.nlp

Class Preprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hft.gradingassistant.nlp.Preprocessor

  • public class Preprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
    preprocesses a list of Records and enriches them with information on tokens, tags, stems, lemmas and syntax tree uses dkpro to process records using the whole preprocessing pipeline at a time
    Author:
    kiefer
